heroSection.title: About Traowl
heroSection.subtitle: Your Gateway to Incredible Journeys
heroSection.description: Discover the world with us. We are passionate about creating unforgettable travel experiences that connect you to new cultures, breathtaking landscapes, and lifelong memories.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To make travel accessible, enjoyable, and transformative for everyone. We believe that travel is not just about visiting places, but about creating connections, understanding cultures, and building bridges between people.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading travel platform that inspires and empowers travelers to explore the world responsibly, creating positive impacts on local communities and the environment.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Founded in 2020 by a group of passionate travelers, Traowl started as a dream to make travel planning easier and more personalized. What began as a small team has grown into a community of travel enthusiasts dedicated to helping you discover the world's hidden gems.

milestones.achievement: Founded with a mission to revolutionize travel planning
Launched our first travel packages to Himachal Pradesh
Expanded to cover 50+ destinations across India

values.title: Adventure
values.description: We encourage exploration and stepping out of comfort zones

values.title: Authenticity
values.description: We provide genuine, local experiences that connect you to destinations

values.title: Sustainability
values.description: We promote responsible travel that respects local environments and communities

values.title: Excellence
values.description: We strive for the highest quality in all our services and experiences

team.name: Rahul Sharma
team.description: A seasoned traveler with 15+ years of experience in the travel industry. Passionate about creating unique travel experiences.

team.name: Priya Patel
team.description: Expert in travel logistics and customer service. Ensures every journey is seamless and memorable.

team.name: Arjun Kumar
team.description: Professional trekker and adventure guide with expertise in Himalayan regions and extreme sports.

team.name: Sneha Agarwal
team.description: Specialist in spiritual and cultural tours, ensuring authentic local experiences for travelers.

testimonials.name: Amit Verma
testimonials.review: Traowl made my Kashmir trip absolutely incredible! The attention to detail and personalized service was outstanding.

testimonials.name: Neha Singh
testimonials.review: The spiritual tour of Varanasi was life-changing. The guides were knowledgeable and the experience was authentic.

testimonials.name: Rajesh Gupta
testimonials.review: Family-friendly packages with great value for money. Our kids loved the adventure activities in Manali!
